bread_description: Kids love to help to make this delicious bread recipe. Itâ€™s quite easy, and they enjoy the fact that they can be eating fresh bread in less than two hours!

Sunflower Seed & Honey Wheat Bread is a wholesome and flavorful homemade bread that combines the nutty taste of sunflower kernels with the natural sweetness of honey. This recipe yields three delicious loaves that are perfect for sandwiches, toasting, or enjoying on their own.
This Banana Bread recipe results in a moist and flavorful loaf with a perfect balance of sweetness and texture
